text:
What is most concerning to me is the articles focus on the threat actor(s) and
not the threat. A blame game accomplishes nothing for understanding system
deficiencies. Instead, focus on what was done and how to mitigate for the future
because there will always be a threat actor. 
On Fri, Jan 26, 2024, 07:21 Michael B. Smith <
%40mail.gmail.com

metadata.topic: RE: More on the Midnight blizzard
